recordTypes.name: Operating Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Online portal to apply for Operating Permits.

recordTypes.name: Permit Application 2026
recordTypes.description: Building, Plumbing, Generator, HVAC, Solar and Energy Systems, Signs, Alarms and Sprinkler Systems. This includes but is not necessarily limited to new construction, additions, alterations, renovations, roof replacement, accessory structures, pools, Oil Tank Removal and or Install, etc.  Also apply here for Prior to Zoning Letters and Certificates.

recordTypes.name: Application for DES (Road Opening, Water Tap, Sewer Connection, Connect to Storm Drainage)
recordTypes.description: Online portal to apply for Water, Sewer, and Stormwater Connections as well as Road Opening Permits. Note: For new driveway or enlarged curb cut openings apply for a Road Opening Permit.

recordTypes.name: Request for Dye Test
recordTypes.description: Online portal to Request for Dye Test to check if connected to the Municipal Sewer System.

recordTypes.name: Peddling, Soliciting, Canvassing, Vendor Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Online portal to apply for Peddling, Soliciting, Canvassing, Vendor Permits

recordTypes.name: Code Enforcement Complaints
recordTypes.description: Submit a Complaint. This includes but is not limited to Property Maintenance issues, Work without a Permit, etc.

recordTypes.name: Request Information for Title Search or Zoning Verification . Note: This shall not be used for standard FOIL requests.
recordTypes.description: Online portal to request a search for records for Title Companies or Zoning verification. Note: This shall not be used for standard FOIL requests.

recordTypes.name: Periodic Inspections (Fire Inspections)
recordTypes.description: Online portal to apply for required Periodic Inspections. This applies to all Commercial and Multifamily (3 or more units) Residential properties.

recordTypes.name: Miscellaneous Permit Application
recordTypes.description:
Online portal to apply for Miscellaneous Permits which include standalone applications to remove trees, resurface driveways, import fill to grade property and work within a wetland and wetland buffer.

Do not select this permit type if any of the above mentioned work will occur due to other construction activities.  In these instances, all work will be grouped together under a building permit application.  
 
If there is already a Permit or Application open please contact us first before starting a new application.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Appeals Application
recordTypes.description: Please DO NOT start this application without speaking with the Codes, Building, & Zoning Division first.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Backflow Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Online portal to apply for an Plumbing only Permit for Backflow Prevention Devices.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Application
recordTypes.description: Online portal to apply for Westchester County Licensed Electricians to apply for an Electrical Permit. This includes but is not necessarily limited to new construction, additions, alterations, renovations, accessory structures, pools, etc.
